column2: an A.M. Eatery////The biggest con was the whole establishment seemed very disorganized. Considering the consistent wait time
column3: there was no where to sit and wait. There's corn hole just outside the steps of the restaurant and they have a couple board games inside. But without anywhere to sit or even stand because of the undirected crowd those are a bit pointless. When we did get called back to our table
column4: we waited an additional five or so minutes Â standing with the inside crowd at the front for a table to be cleared. The hostess' couldn't keep track of who was who and tried seating us with another party.
